懟字的基本解释

懟
duì
见“怼”。

懟字的汉语字典释义

[①]［duì］
［《廣韻》直類切，去至，澄。］
［《集韻》徒對切，去隊，定。］
亦作“譵1”。“怼1”的繁体字。
(1)怨恨。
(2)凶狠。
(3)见“懟”。

懟字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　懟； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页406第37
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?直類切，音墜。【說文】怨也。从心對聲。或从言。　又【集韻】徒對切，音隊。本作憝，或作懟，義同。【詩·大雅】彊禦多懟。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［duì］
["Guangyun" straight cut, go to, clear. ]
["Jiyun" cuts each other, go to the team, set. ]
Also known as "譵1". Traditional characters for "怼1".
(1) Resentment.
(2) Fierce.
(3) See "怼".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　怼; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 406 Page 37
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Straight cut, sound pendant. [Said the text] Complaint too. From the heart to the voice. Or from words.　 [Ji Yun] Discretionary cut, sound team. This is 憝, or 怼, has the same meaning. [Poetry·Daya] Powerful and arrogant.
